document.full_text: texas lawmakers could be headed to a special legislative session as early as tuesday after a late-night filibuster on sunday delayed a bill linked to the state budget, officials said.
document.title: texas lawmakers may need special session for budget
lines_and_colors: texas lawmakers could be headed to a special legislative session as early as tuesday after a late-night filibuster on sunday delayed a bill linked to the state budget, officials said.
